N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 220.4 - Schedule of fees for state weights and measures calibration

State Regulations

The following schedule of fees may be the amounts that shall
be charged for any calibration performed by State weights and measures
personnel, upon the standards of weights and measures of any person, firm or
corporation requesting calibration services: (a) Mass standards. (1)

Calibration of field standards: (i) Test kits 1-18 weights, largest weight
not exceeding 5 kg (11 lb): (a) calibrations
for municipal weights and measures... $45
(b) calibrations not for municipal weights
and measures... 150
(ii)

Test kits over 18 weights, largest weight not exceeding 5 kg (11 lb): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $85
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 250
(iii)

Up to and including 3 kg (7 lb): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $10
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 20
(iv)

Over 3 kg and including 30 kg (66 lb): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $15
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 75
(v) Over 30 kg and including 1,200 kg (2,646
lb): (a) calibrations for municipal weights
and measures... $35
(b) calibrations not for municipal weights and measures... 75
(2)

Calibration of laboratory
standards: (i) Up to and including 3 kg (7
lb)... $50
(ii)

Over 3 kg and
including 30 kg (66 lb)... 120
(iii)

Over 30 kg and including 1,200 kg
(2,646 lb)... 150
(b) Volumetric standards. (1)

Calibration of field standards: (i) Up to and including 20 L (5 gal): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $15
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 75
(ii)

Over 20 L and including 100 L (26 gal): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $40
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 175
(iii)

Over 100 L and including 1,000 L (264
gal): (a) calibrations for municipal weights
and measures... $90
(b) calibrations not for municipal weights and measures... 400
(iv)

Over 1,000 L and including 5,000 L
(1,321 gal): (a) calibrations for municipal
weights and measures... $235
(b) calibrations not for municipal weights and measures... 900
(v) Over 5,000 L: (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $285
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 1200
(2)

Calibration of slicker plate and
laboratory standards: (i) Up to and including
4 L (1 gal): (a) calibration for municipal
weights and measures... $25
(b) calibration not for municipal weights and measures... 100
(ii)

Over 4 L and including 40 L (11 gal): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $55
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 225
(3)

Calibration of LPG standards: (i) Up to and including 100 L (26 gal): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $275
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 450
(ii)

Over 100 L and including 400 L (106
gal): (a) calibrations for municipal weights
and measures... $325
(b) calibrations not for municipal weights and measures... 650
(iii)

Over 400 L: (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $400
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 1000
(c) Linear standards. (1)

Calibration: (i) Up to and including 2 m (7 ft): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $15
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 40
(ii)

Over 2 m and including 16 m (52 ft): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $30
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 100
(iii)

Over 16 m and including 31 m (102 ft): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $50
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 150
(iv)

Over 31 m and including 61 m (200 ft): (a) calibrations for municipal weights and
measures... $70
(b) calibrations
not for municipal weights and measures... 300
(2)

Calibration: For each reported interval requested, add to above
fee............$ 5
(d) For any special test requested, an hourly
rate of $ 150 may be charged. Estimates shall be given upon request. (e) This fee schedule shall also apply to any
local jurisdiction whose laboratory has been certified by the State Bureau of

Weights and Measures and shall be the maximum permitted fees that may be
charged by the local jurisdiction. Notes
